    P

    Person - Class in model
    Represents a person (player or dealer) in the Blackjack game.
    Person() - Constructor for class model.Person
    Constructs a new person with an empty hand and an empty name.
    Player - Class in model
    Represents a player in the Blackjack game, extending from the Person class.
    Player(String) - Constructor for class model.Player
    Constructs a new Player with the given name.
    playerTurn() - Method in class controller.Game
    Initiates the player's turn by displaying the appropriate buttons and hand value.
    printDealerFirstHand(Dealer) - Method in class view.View
    Displays the dealer's first hand, with the second card face down and the rest of the cards visible.
    printDealerHand(Dealer) - Method in class view.View
    Displays all the dealer's cards, updating their images based on the current state of the dealer's hand.
    printPlayerHand(Player) - Method in class view.View
    Show player cards
